title: Top Quality Regulations for Dispute Resolution
description: In 2024, Togo achieved a high score of 94.6 in the quality of regulations for dispute resolution, indicating strong legal frameworks.

title: Low Female Representation in Tertiary Education Staff
description: As of 2021, only 6.1% of academic staff in tertiary education in Togo were female, highlighting a significant gender disparity.

title: Minimal Diarrhea Treatment Coverage
description: In 2017, only 13.6% of children under 5 in Togo received ORS packets for diarrhea treatment, indicating low healthcare coverage.

title: Scarcity of R&D Technicians
description: In 2018, Togo had only 3.6 technicians per million people working in R&D, showing a lack of technical expertise in research and development.
